About
About
Hello! If you're here, you've found the internet manifestation of my quest to find work that feels like play. Welcome :)

I'm driven by a curiosity surrounding what I can do to make people's personal and professional lives easier or more meaningful. My path (from consulting to edtech to founder development to entrepreneurship) has been shaped by this curiosity.

Each step has taught me something valuable: how big companies transform even at their scales, how beautiful products grow, how founders learn and lead, and how to validate ideas directly with users.

When I'm not working, you'll find me experimenting in the kitchen, training my voice to sing well all the songs I sing badly anyway, or reading!

Apr 2024 - Present ¬∑ 1 yr 4 mos
Apr 2024 to Present ¬∑ 1 yr 4 mos
Bengaluru, Karnataka, India
Bengaluru, Karnataka, India
Learnt what it means to be intentional by experimenting (personally and professionally)

- Explored entrepreneurship: My co-founder and I conducted research with 200+ users, developed samples with manufacturers across Asia, and began building brand identity; Discovered I'd love to start up when truly pulled by a problem + learnt about my strengths and what makes work fulfilling for me
- Began expanding my brain dimensionally by relearning baking (I make banging cookies now) and learning to sing
- Completed a 10-day Vipassana meditation course to build resilience and equanimity
Building 10xAcademy
Building 10xAcademy
xto10x ¬∑ Full-time
xto10x ¬∑ Full-time
Oct 2021 - Mar 2024 ¬∑ 2 yrs 6 mos
Oct 2021 to Mar 2024 ¬∑ 2 yrs 6 mos
Bengaluru, Karnataka, India
Bengaluru, Karnataka, India
Wore multiple hats to help founders navigate the messy middle of scaling up

1. As part of the Leadership Learning team and the Growth Consulting team:
- Led xto10x's flagship 3-month learning program for founders of B2C/ D2C growth-stage startups in partnership with Peak XV Partners (formerly Sequoia India & SEA) - pivoted the offering to focus on sustainable growth with deeper 1:1 mentorship and brought 7 startups (including Minimalist, Qoala, Eduvanz) through the program
- Developed growth roadmaps for consumer startups looking to uncover new growth levers, by leveraging user research and app usage data. For e.g., helped India's first e-bike producer unlock a previously untapped market

2. As a Product and Marketing Lead:
- Created 'Leadership Quotient' from scratch - a first-of-its-kind tool that helps founders and startup leaders understand and elevate their leadership style. This was the first time I worked with developers and designers to bring a product to life, and I absolutely loved this experience!
- Built founder-centric communities - launched 'The Startup Summit' (bringing 100+ new startups into xto10x's top-of-funnel) and 'The Startup Founders' Community' (creating trusted circles for 25+ growth-stage founders)
Growth & Strategy
Growth & Strategy
Toddle - Your Teaching Partner
Toddle - Your Teaching Partner
Mar 2021 - Sep 2021 ¬∑ 7 mos
Mar 2021 to Sep 2021 ¬∑ 7 mos
Bengaluru, Karnataka, India ¬∑ Remote
Bengaluru, Karnataka, India ¬∑ Remote
Helped the team test and prove growth levers

- Planned GTM strategy for a new vertical (Toddle for IBDP) and collaborated with COO and sales teams to identify the right staffing requirements to launch and scale the product's revenues significantly
- Worked with the CEO to design and launch new GTM channels including affiliate programs in regions where we had low penetration (like LatAm) - drove meaningful revenue growth within just 3 months of starting the initiatives
Business Analyst
Business Analyst
McKinsey & Company
McKinsey & Company
Aug 2019 - Mar 2021 ¬∑ 1 yr 8 mos
Aug 2019 to Mar 2021 ¬∑ 1 yr 8 mos
Mumbai Metropolitan Region
Mumbai Metropolitan Region
Worked on projects spanning retail, banking, education, and private equity

- Designed a first-of-its-kind retail cost transformation program for a large Indian grocery retailer - independently led store cost transformation efforts and instituted an innovative part-time staffing model across their extensive store network of roughly 700 stores
- Partnered with McKinsey's specialist change facilitation team (Aberkyn) to design and deliver a leadership development & cultural transformation program during the merger of three large public sector banks - created development plans for leaders to gain role clarity and build trust
- Led strategic initiatives for an education non-profit, including implementing blended learning approaches and developing an expansion plan to diversify impact beyond Tier 1 cities
